title: Complex Number Multiplication
description:
A complex number can be represented as a string on the form "real+imaginaryi" where:

real is the real part and is an integer in the range [-100, 100].
imaginary is the imaginary part and is an integer in the range [-100, 100].
i2 == -1.

Given two complex numbers num1 and num2 as strings, return a string of the complex number that represents their multiplications.
 
Example 1:

Input: num1 = "1+1i", num2 = "1+1i"
Output: "0+2i"
Explanation: (1 + i) * (1 + i) = 1 + i2 + 2 * i = 2i, and you need convert it to the form of 0+2i.

Example 2:

Input: num1 = "1+-1i", num2 = "1+-1i"
Output: "0+-2i"
Explanation: (1 - i) * (1 - i) = 1 + i2 - 2 * i = -2i, and you need convert it to the form of 0+-2i.

 
Constraints:

num1 and num2 are valid complex numbers.
starter_code:
class Solution:
    def complexNumberMultiply(self, num1: str, num2: str) -> str:
preamble:
from typing import *
from collections import *
from functools import *
from itertools import *
from heapq import *
from bisect import *
from math import *
import math, collections, functools, itertools, bisect, heapq, string, re
check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(num1 = "100+0i",num2 = "0+100i") == "0+10000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "7+-8i",num2 = "-9+2i") == "-47+86i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-50+-50i",num2 = "50+50i") == "0+-5000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+-1i",num2 = "1+-1i") == "0+-2i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+1i",num2 = "1+1i") == "0+2i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "2+3i",num2 = "3+4i") == "-6+17i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-100+-100i",num2 = "100+100i") == "0+-20000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "50+50i",num2 = "50+50i") == "0+5000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "33+-50i",num2 = "-20+77i") == "3190+3541i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+0i",num2 = "0+0i") == "0+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+0i",num2 = "5+6i") == "0+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "3+4i",num2 = "-4+3i") == "-24+-7i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1+2i",num2 = "3+-4i") == "5+10i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "2+3i",num2 = "3+2i") == "0+13i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "10+-10i",num2 = "-10+10i") == "0+200i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "100+100i",num2 = "-100+-100i") == "0+-20000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1+1i",num2 = "1+1i") == "-2+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1+-1i",num2 = "-1+-1i") == "0+2i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "12+34i",num2 = "56+78i") == "-1980+2840i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "25+75i",num2 = "-75+25i") == "-3750+-5000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-50+50i",num2 = "50+50i") == "-5000+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+0i",num2 = "1+0i") == "1+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+0i",num2 = "100+100i") == "0+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "100+0i",num2 = "-100+0i") == "-10000+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-25+25i",num2 = "25+25i") == "-1250+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "42+0i",num2 = "0+42i") == "0+1764i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+1i",num2 = "1+0i") == "0+1i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+50i",num2 = "50+0i") == "0+2500i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-50+0i",num2 = "0+-50i") == "0+2500i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "50+0i",num2 = "-50+0i") == "-2500+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "88+11i",num2 = "-44+22i") == "-4114+1452i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "50+30i",num2 = "-20+40i") == "-2200+1400i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-99+99i",num2 = "99+99i") == "-19602+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "75+25i",num2 = "-25+75i") == "-3750+5000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-99+-99i",num2 = "99+99i") == "0+-19602i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1011+789i",num2 = "456+123i") == "-558063+235431i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "88+88i",num2 = "11+11i") == "0+1936i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-100+0i",num2 = "-100+0i") == "10000+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "123+-456i",num2 = "-789+101i") == "-50991+372207i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1+0i",num2 = "-1+0i") == "1+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "50+0i",num2 = "0+50i") == "0+2500i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-89+34i",num2 = "56+-23i") == "-4202+3951i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+-50i",num2 = "-50+0i") == "0+2500i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-100+0i",num2 = "0+100i") == "0+-10000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "66+88i",num2 = "88+66i") == "0+12100i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "99+99i",num2 = "1+1i") == "0+198i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-1+1i",num2 = "-1+1i") == "0+-2i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "34+56i",num2 = "-78+90i") == "-7692+-1308i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-100+0i",num2 = "0+-100i") == "0+10000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+0i",num2 = "-100+-100i") == "0+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "50+-50i",num2 = "-50+50i") == "0+5000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "99+99i",num2 = "-99+99i") == "-19602+0i"

    assert candidate(num1 = "100+0i",num2 = "100+0i") == "10000+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "-20+-30i",num2 = "20+30i") == "500+-1200i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+0i",num2 = "-1+0i") == "-1+0i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+0i",num2 = "0+1i") == "0+1i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "99+1i",num2 = "1+99i") == "0+9802i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "0+100i",num2 = "100+0i") == "0+10000i"
    assert candidate(num1 = "1+-1i",num2 = "-100+100i") == "0+200i"
